actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow tax-free withdraws from individuals retirement accounts for educational expenses.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow tax-free withdrawals from individual retirement plans for the educational expenses of a child. Limits such withdrawals to $2,000 per year per child. Excludes such withdrawals from gross income determinations.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow tax-free withdraws from individuals retirement accounts for educational expenses.
